modules.description: Provides functions to compile YARA rules, match patterns against binary data, and extract metadata from matches. Works with byte sequences, compiled rule sets, and match results. Used to detect known malware signatures in files or memory dumps.

Initializes and deinitializes a YARA rule compiler, creates a compiler instance, adds strings or files to it, compiles rules, and scans memory or files for matches using defined rules. Operates on YARA-specific structures like compilers, rules, and metadata. Used for malware detection by analyzing binary data against custom pattern rules.
